search.query: | tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_pageviews) AS http_session_pageviews FROM datamodel=Web WHERE Web.site="$site$" "Web.eventtype"=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session
|inputlookup WA_settings.csv | search key=site | fields value source | dedup value

input.label: Compare settings
input.choice: Compare against equivalent period in past day/week/month

search.query: | makeresults count=1 | eval site="$site$", span="$span$" | eval ImmediatePeriodCompare=$ImmediatePeriodCompare$ | `addTimeCompareWindow` | map search=" | tstats summariesonly=t count AS Count FROM datamodel=Web WHERE Web.site="$site$" "Web.eventtype"=pageview (earliest=$$earliestCompare$$ latest=$$latestCompare$$) OR (earliest=$$info_min_time$$ latest=$$info_max_time$$) GROUPBY _time $span$ | timechart sum(Count) AS Count $span$ | timewrap \"$$windowLength$$\" | eval window=$$window$$, windowLength=\"$$windowLength$$\", earliestCompare=$$earliestCompare$$, latestCompare=$$latestCompare$$, info_min_time=$$info_min_time$$, info_max_time=$$info_max_time$$ | fields Count window windowLength earliestCompare latestCompare info_min_time info_max_time $$FieldnameCurrentPeriod$$ $$FieldnameComparePeriod$$ " | table _time Count_latest* Count*_before

| tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_pageviews) FROM datamodel=Web WHERE Web.site="$site$" "Web.eventtype"=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session | stats sum(max(Web.http_session_pageviews)) AS Count
| eval ImmediatePeriodCompare=$ImmediatePeriodCompare$ | `addTimeCompareWindow` | eval site="$site$" | map search=" | tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_pageviews) FROM datamodel=Web WHERE Web.site="$$site$$" "Web.eventtype"=pageview earliest=$$earliestCompare$$ latest=$$latestCompare$$ GROUPBY Web.http_session | stats sum(max(Web.http_session_pageviews)) AS CountCompare | eval Count="$$Count$$", window=$$window$$, windowLength=\"$$windowLength$$\", earliestCompare=$$earliestCompare$$, latestCompare=$$latestCompare$$, info_min_time=$$info_min_time$$, info_max_time=$$info_max_time$$ " | `generateTimeComparison`

| tstats summariesonly=t dc(Web.http_session) AS Count FROM datamodel=Web WHERE Web.site="$site$" "Web.eventtype"=pageview | stats sum(Count) AS Count | eval ImmediatePeriodCompare=$ImmediatePeriodCompare$ | `addTimeCompareWindow` | eval site="$site$" | map search=" | tstats summariesonly=t dc(Web.http_session) AS Count FROM datamodel=Web WHERE Web.site="$$site$$" "Web.eventtype"=pageview earliest=$$earliestCompare$$ latest=$$latestCompare$$ | stats sum(Count) AS CountCompare | eval Count="$$Count$$", window=$$window$$, windowLength=\"$$windowLength$$\", earliestCompare=$$earliestCompare$$, latestCompare=$$latestCompare$$, info_min_time=$$info_min_time$$, info_max_time=$$info_max_time$$ " | `generateTimeComparison`

| tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_duration) AS http_session_duration FROM datamodel=Web WHERE Web.site="$site$" "Web.eventtype"=pageview GROUPBY Web.http_session | stats avg(http_session_duration) AS AvgDuration | eval AvgDuration=round(AvgDuration, 0) | fieldformat AvgDuration = strftime(AvgDuration, "%M:%S")

| stats count(eval(http_session_pageviews=1)) AS Bounces, count(eval(http_session_pageviews>1)) AS NonBounces | eval Bouncerate=round(100*(Bounces/(Bounces+NonBounces)),2) | eval Count=Bouncerate | fields Count
| eval ImmediatePeriodCompare=$ImmediatePeriodCompare$ | `addTimeCompareWindow` | eval site="$site$" | map search=" | tstats summariesonly=t max(Web.http_session_pageviews) AS http_session_pageviews FROM datamodel=Web WHERE Web.site="$$site$$" "Web.eventtype"=pageview earliest=$$earliestCompare$$ latest=$$latestCompare$$ GROUPBY Web.http_session | stats count(eval(http_session_pageviews=1)) AS Bounces, count(eval(http_session_pageviews>1)) AS NonBounces | eval Bouncerate=round(100*(Bounces/(Bounces+NonBounces)),2) | eval CountCompare=Bouncerate | fields CountCompare
| eval Count="$$Count$$", window=$$window$$, windowLength=\"$$windowLength$$\", earliestCompare=$$earliestCompare$$, latestCompare=$$latestCompare$$, info_min_time=$$info_min_time$$, info_max_time=$$info_max_time$$ " | `generateTimeComparison`

| tstats summariesonly=t count,max(Web.http_session_duration) AS http_session_duration,min(_time) AS _time FROM datamodel=Web WHERE Web.site="$site$" "Web.eventtype"=pageview GROUPBY Web.uri,Web.http_session | rename Web.* AS * | sort 0 http_session -_time | streamstats earliest(_time) AS PageExitTime window=1 current=f by http_session | eval EngagementTime=PageExitTime-_time | stats avg(EngagementTime) AS EngagementTime, sum(count) AS count BY uri | rename EngagementTime AS "Engagement Time" | fieldformat "Engagement Time" = strftime('Engagement Time', "%M:%S")
| eventstats sum(count) as Total | eval percent = round((count/Total)*100,2) . "%" | fields - Total | rename percent AS "% Pageviews" | addcoltotals Pageviews labelfield=uri | rename uri AS Page | rename count as Pageviews | sort 0 -Pageviews
